title: Why  can't I hit and have a constant 60 fps on max settings with a GTX 960?
body: I bought this card thinking it could easily run league on max settings and hit way over 60 fps, Am i doing something wrong???

replies.body: It is defiantly a drivers issue. Anytime windows 10 updates it totally screws with Nvidia GPU's it is a real pain in the ass and effects everything it is used for not just league.  You might want to check that windows is actually using the GPU and not the integrated graphics. Happened to me once a drastic drop in performance and figured out that it was running on the Intel Integrated Graphics and not the GPU.

You might have outdated drivers or hardware issue that could cause your fps to drop.  I recommend going over each step in our[ FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your performance.  This should get you fixed p!

This issue might be caused by the recent windows 10 update
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12387/windows-10-update-history

Tho I still have no fix for it.

Edit: 
Try to reinstall the game. Helped for me.
